title: Changing summoner name has effects on what?
body:
Ok. why am i 'posting as #####', where ##### is the summoner name i changed like 6 month ago?

Also, i am not getting any event icons like star guardian icon. May be the name changing has to do with it?

replies.body: I'm having a hard time understanding the issue here.  Sometimes your boards profile needs to sync with the boards, are you still having an issues with how your name appears?  Summoner names don't have any relevance to unlocking content or rewards.  Let me know!

well the message was posted with current summoner name. It said "posting as ####" on the bottom when i was writing this though.

Also, when i did the star guardian survey, i believe i saw my last summoner name somewhere before closing the tab. please fix this.
